member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.Form1.ButtonOn_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Function to set ON the calculator. The calculator will not work until this button is pressed (isOn = true) It also clears every stored data regarding operands and operators (clear all) [C].

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.Form1.ButtonClearError_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When 'CE' button is clicked, the displayed value is set to 0 and the subtotal is resetted.

member.name: M:Calculator_v1_vb.Form1.ButtonSolve_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When button 'solve' is clicked, the arrays that contain the series of operands and operators are looped in order to make those operations consecutively and saving and adding the result of each loop in 'subtotal' global variable.

member.summary: (For calculator III) This button makes negative a positive number, and vice-versa)
